title: Geospatial Data Sources
text: This page provides an overview of the main geospatial data repositories used in the GeoLink project, with links to detailed pages for each source.

title: Geospatial Data Sources
text:
üóÇÔ∏è Overview of Data Sources



Source
Description
Link to details




GeoSpatialData
Central folder on the R drive with raster, vector, and grid data
GeoSpatialData on R Drive


GRASS GIS
GRASS-based spatial database used for modeling and processing workflows
GRASS GIS Environment


GIS Database
PostgreSQL/PostGIS database containing national vector layers
PostgreSQL GIS Database
